headline.main: EX-BUND TROOPER IN CUSTODY AS SPY; Arrest of Naturalized Citizen Recently Back From Reich Brings Total to 33

lead_paragraph: A former Storm Trooper of the German-American Bund was arrested yesterday by agents of the Federal Bureau of Investigation as a member of the alleged espionage ring uncovered over the week-end. His arrest brought to thirty-three the number of men and women who have been taken into custody in the case.
abstract: G W Kaercher, former German-Amer Bund trooper arrested; por; 33 in custody, N Y C; Dold, Walischewsky and R Mezenen, Pan Amer Airways steward, plead guilty
